name: XrayHeroku
keywords: xray vmess vless trojan shadowsocks socks tor

AA.description: Advanced users only need to modify the following AUUID and click the Deploy app button at the end of the page to start deployment
AA.value: If you got some errors, please check the parameter format or try again. To use custom parameters, be sure to fully understand their meanings first

AUUID.description: UUID acts as the path and account password of each configuration. It is recommended to modify and save it properly. UUID website can be generated: https://www.uuidgenerator.net

CONFIGCADDY.description: Please do not modify it if you are not familiar with the CADDY configuration

CONFIGXRAY.description: User-defined network address. Read configuration to run xray, please do not modify it if you are not familiar with xray configuration

ParameterSSENCYPT.description: SS encryption method, check the support agreement: https://www.v2fly.org/config/protocols/shadowsocks.html

StoreFiles.description: User-defined network address to read the list of stored files
